data.title: John Wright

data.text:
John Wright is an American editor. He did editing work in Die Hard with a Vengeance.

Career[]

Wright also editing work with various movies directed by Die Hard with a Vengeance director John McTiernan, such as The Hunt for Red October, The 13th Warrior, the 1999 version of The Thomas Crown Affair and 2002 film version of Rollerball. He also edited The Running Man, Last Action Hero (with composed music by Michael Kamen), Speed, Broken Arrow, X-Men (once again scored by Kamen), The Passion of the Christ, Glory Road, Apocalypto, The Incredible Hulk and Secretariat.

[]
